product_name: Gracie by Soybu Little Caboose Capri Pants - Girls'
long_description: With their refined fit and styling and hard-working fabric, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Little Caboose Capri Pants will be a staple of your active girl's wardrobe. Stretch Re-FLEX fabric is breathable, quick-drying, moisture-wicking and wrinkle-resistant. The Gracie by Soybu Little Caboose Capri Pants feature yoke styling in the seat, comfortable flat seams and feminine ruffles at the hems.
short_description: With their refined fit and styling and hard-working fabric, the girls' Gracie by Soybu Little Caboose Capri Pants will be a staple of your active girl's wardrobe.
